price: «እናንተ ከሴቶች አልፋችሁ ወንዶችን (ለተመሳሳይ ጾታዊ ግኑኝነት) ለመከጀል ትመጣላችሁን? በእውነቱ እናንተ የምትሳሳቱ ሕዝቦች ናቸሁ፡፡»
arabic: أَئِنَّكُمۡ لَتَأۡتُونَ ٱلرِّجَالَ شَهۡوَةٗ مِّن دُونِ ٱلنِّسَآءِۚ بَلۡ أَنتُمۡ قَوۡمٞ تَجۡهَلُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: a-innakum latatūna al-rijāla shahwatan min dūni al-nisāi bal antum qawmun tajhalūna
